classDiagram
    class ICanvas {
        <<interface>>
        + SetColor(color)
        + MoveTo(x, y)
        + LineTo(x, y)
        + DrawCircle(cx, cy, rx)
        + DrawText(left, top, fontSize, textValue)
    }

    class CCanvas {
        - sf::RenderWindow& m_window
        - float m_x
        - float m_y
        - sf::Color m_color
        + SetColor(color)
        + MoveTo(x, y)
        + LineTo(x, y)
        + DrawEllipse(cx, cy, rx, ry)
        + DrawText(left, top, fontSize, textValue)
    }

    class ICanvasDrawable {
        <<interface>>
        + Draw(canvas)
    }

    class Client {
        + MakePainting(input, designer, painter, canvas)
    }

    class CDesigner {
        - CShapeFactory& m_factory
        + CreateDraft(inputData) PictureDraft
    }

    class IDesigner {
        <<interface>>
        + CreateDraft(inputData) PictureDraft
    }

    class CPainter {
        + DrawPicture(draft, canvas)
    }

    class ICPainter {
        <<interface>>
        + DrawPicture(draft, canvas)
    }

    class PictureDraft {
        - std::vector~std::unique_ptr~Shape~~ m_shapes
        + GetShapeCount() int
        + GetShape(index) Shape*
        + AddShape(shape)
    }

    class IShapeStrategy {
        <<interface>>
        + Draw(canvas, color)
    }

    class CircleStrategy {
        - CPoint m_center
        - double m_radius
        + Draw(canvas, color)
        + GetCenter() CPoint
        + GetRadius() double
    }

    class LineStrategy {
        - CPoint m_startPoint
        - CPoint m_endPoint
        + Draw(canvas, color)
        + GetStartPoint() CPoint
        + GetEndPoint() CPoint
    }

    class RectangleStrategy {
        - CPoint m_vertex
        - double m_width
        - double m_height
        + Draw(canvas, color)
        + GetWidth() double
        + GetHeight() double
    }

    class TextStrategy {
        - CPoint m_startPoint
        - double m_fontSize
        - std::string m_text
        + Draw(canvas, color)
        + GetStartPoint() CPoint
        + GetSize() double
        + GetText() std::string
    }

    class TriangleStrategy {
        - CPoint m_vertex1
        - CPoint m_vertex2
        - CPoint m_vertex3
        + Draw(canvas, color)
        + GetVertex1() CPoint
        + GetVertex2() CPoint
        + GetVertex3() CPoint
    }

    class Shape {
        - std::unique_ptr~IShapeStrategy~ m_shapeStrategy
        - Color m_color
        + Draw(canvas)
        + SetColor(color)
        + SetShapeStrategy(shapeStrategy)
        + GetColor() Color
    }

%%    Доработать диаграмму
    class CShapeFactory {
        - ParseColor(colorOption) Color
        - ParseShapeType(string) Shapes
        - CreateTriangle(iss) std::unique_ptr~IShapeStrategy~
        - CreateRectangle(iss) std::unique_ptr~IShapeStrategy~
        - CreateCircle(iss) std::unique_ptr~IShapeStrategy~
        - CreateLine(iss) std::unique_ptr~IShapeStrategy~
        - CreateText(iss) std::unique_ptr~IShapeStrategy~
        + CreateShape(iss, color) std::unique_ptr~Shape~
    }

    class IShapeFactory {
        <<interface>>
        + CreateShape(iss, color) std::unique_ptr~Shape~
    }

    class Shapes {
        <<enumeration>>
        Triangle
        Rectangle
        Circle
        Line
        Text
    }

    class Color {
        <<enumeration>>
        Green
        Red
        Blue
        Yellow
        Pink
        Black
    }

    class CPoint {
        +double x
        +double y
    }
